chart.name: chart.sales.last.month
chart.title: Sales distribution per product category
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(sol.exTaxTotal) AS totalSum, sol.product.productCategory.name AS category FROM SaleOrderLine AS sol LEFT JOIN SaleOrder so ON sol.saleOrder = so.id LEFT JOIN Product p ON sol.product = p.id WHERE so.statusSelect = 'confirmed' AND so.confirmationDateT BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE - 30 AND CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY sol.product.productCategory.name

chart.name: chart.turnover.per.customer
chart.title: Turnover per customer
chart.dataset: SELECT CASE WHEN so.status_select = 'cancelled' THEN 'Proportion of turnover lost on canceled orders' WHEN so.status_select = 'confirmed' THEN 'Proportion of turnover earned on confirmed orders' WHEN so.status_select = 'quotation' THEN 'Proportion of forecast turnover on quotes' END AS display, SUM(sol.ex_tax_total) AS total_sales FROM sales_sale_order so JOIN sales_sale_order_line sol ON so.id = sol.sale_order JOIN contact_contact c ON so.customer = c.id WHERE c.id = :customer AND so.status_select != 'draft' GROUP BY so.status_select;

chart.name: chart.amount.invoiced.per.month
chart.title: Amount invoiced per month over 3 months
chart.dataset: SELECT CASE WHEN so.status_select = 'cancelled' THEN 'Proportion of turnover lost on canceled orders' WHEN so.status_select = 'confirmed' THEN 'Proportion of turnover earned on confirmed orders' WHEN so.status_select = 'quotation' THEN 'Proportion of forecast turnover on quotes' END AS display, SUM(sol.ex_tax_total) AS total_sales FROM sales_sale_order so JOIN sales_sale_order_line sol ON so.id = sol.sale_order JOIN contact_contact c ON so.customer = c.id WHERE c.id = :customer AND so.status_select != 'draft' GROUP BY so.status_select;
